Package cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.states

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.states.State
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AboutState, EndState, GameState, MenuState, RulesState
    public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object
    State is an abstract class for all different types of game states the game can be in.

    Each type of state has different appearance as well as different user interaction options. This class also contains the static methods getState and setState which are responsible for changing of the current state.
